typewriter.builder: I build things for the web

mediaHero.name: Media Hero
mediaHero.description: Led a cross‑functional team to build a robust data platform that improved data accessibility for stakeholders and clients. Delivered a Next.js + tRPC + Prisma platform in 9 months and managed CI/CD and infrastructure with Terraform on GCP. Drove collaboration improvements with Linear by managing AI agents, boosting team productivity. Designed a cohesive UI using Ant Design, Shadcn, and Tailwind, and instrumented engagement with PostHog. Also launched the company’s first marketing site using Webflow, increasing online visibility.

xp.name: XP Inc.
xp.description: Built tools that improved workflow reliability and centralized data across multiple systems and databases. Delivered a real‑time web dashboard for financial data, gathering direct analyst feedback to prioritize features that increased productivity and decision‑making confidence.

pipefy.name: Pipefy
pipefy.description: Graduated from the Young Guns Tech trainee program, rotating across teams to learn the product and customers. Shipped features such as Share Inbox, Form Hub, and Guest Portal. On the PLG team, improved conversion by enhancing usability and FTUE, running iterative A/B tests with design. Stack: TypeScript, React, GraphQL, Ruby on Rails, and Elixir.

xpIntern.name: XP Inc.
xpIntern.description: On the Project Squad, built a Django portal to monitor fund performance, integrated Power BI dashboards, and implemented automations that improved team efficiency. Helped manage and validate platform updates.

adp.name: Amigos da Poli
adp.description: Built the 2020 Project Notice site with Angular and launched a new brand website with a React/Gatsby CMS. The new site increased conversions and donations; during the Month of Giving, created a real‑time donations dashboard that gamified engagement and boosted participation.

poliJunior.name: Poli Júnior
poliJunior.description: Delivered custom systems for clients using Django, React, React Native, and Node.js. Introduced and trained the team on modern web technologies and software architecture practices. Co‑organized Workshop Integrativo, Latin America’s largest recruitment fair; built a Django information system to digitize and centralize fair data and created a WhatsApp chatbot that increased conversions and traffic.

zoroscopo.name: Zoroscopo
zoroscopo.description: AI-powered, privacy-first astrological readings in Brazilian Portuguese that rigorously validate solar sign, ascendant, houses, planetary influences, and current transits.
zoroscopo.stack: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui (Radix), tRPC, TanStack Query, Zod, Prisma + PostgreSQL (Neon), Resend (magic link), Google Generative AI (Gemini 2.5) via ai SDK, OpenStreetMap Nominatim (geocoding), Vercel for hosting
